title: Connect Four
description: Classic Connect Four: Two players take turns putting pieces on the board, the first player to achieve a row of horizontal, vertical or diagonal pieces wins. Play with the mouse, or press left/right arrows and enter to play with the keyboard. Activate the dark mode by pressing 'n' on the keyboard.

title: GitHub API
description: Enter your github credentials and a github user to search for to see the ten last commit messages of the last 15 repositories the user worked on.

title: Carousel
description: An image carousel that slides through four images of sheep infinitely. Click on the right arrow to jump to the next one or the dots to jump to the corresponding one

title: Spotify Search
description: Enter a search term and choose wether to show results for artists or albums and see 20 results. Scroll down and click on 'more', to load 20 more results. Add '?scroll=infinite' to the url to activate infinite scrolling.

title: Reichstag Page
description: Your typical landing page: A header, a big image, some information and a footer. A popup on page load. A menu appears when you click on the menu icon in the top right corner of the page.

title: Incremental Search
description: Start typing away in the input field and four or less names of countries that match your input will become available for autocompletion.

title: JSON Validation
description: Type some JSON into the input field and click 'Go', the title will turn green if the input was valid JSON format, red if it wasn't.

title: Racing Game
description: A racing game that is played by clicking somewhere on the page. Each racer will move forward a by an unpredictable amount. Use the 'BOOST' button to boost the first racer forward.

title: Panes
description: Two images: Slide the blue bar to the left or right to reveal more of one picture and hide the other.

title: Ticker
description: A news ticker, going across the screen, repeating itself after a while. Hover over the ticker to stop the animation and click on a link to be redirected to the corresponding article.

title: Portfolio
description: The portfolio page you're looking at right now. Go to the home page to get an overview of all projects or click on one to see a large screenshot of the project and a description. Click on it again to launch the project.

title: F.U.N. Song Lyrics
description: Lyrics to the 'F.U.N. Song', appearing in the 'F.U.N' Episode (Season One) of Spongebob Squarepants.

title: Canvas Drawing
description: A drawing made by specifying paths in JavaScript on an HTML canvas element.
